eu.gricom.interpreter.basic.statements

Class AssignStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.gricom.interpreter.basic.statements.AssignStatement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Statement

    public final class AssignStatement
extends Object
implements Statement
    AssignStatement.java

    Description:

    An assignment statement evaluates an expression and stores the result in a variable.

    (c) = 2004,..,2016 by Andreas Grimm, Den Haag, The Netherlands

    Created in 2003

      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws Exception
        The assignment is defined as part of the default constructor. But only here the transaction is actually executed. After the execution, the variable is assigned.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface Statement
        Throws:
        Exception - - any excpetion coming from the memory management

      • content

        public String content()
        This method is used in testing and debugging. It returns the set values when the constructor has been called.
        Specified by:
        content in interface Statement
        Returns:
        - readable string with the name and the value of the assignment
